prefix.long: Set a new command prefix. The first character must be alpha-numeric.

choose.short: Draft random civs for each player.
choose.long: Draft a unique fixed-sized pool of random civilizations for each player.

blacklist.long: Get the complete list of all banned civilizations.

dlcs.long: Get the complete list of all dlcs.

draft_pool.long: Get the complete list of unbanned and enabled civs.

ban.long: Ban a civilization from being chosen in a final draft.

unban.long: Unban a civilization from being chosen.

enable.long: Enables a DLC such that all of its civs will be put in the draft pool.

disable.long: Disables a DLC such that all of its civs will not be put in the draft pool even if the civ is unbanned.
